mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure that text and images scale correctly on all devices, especially on mobile, to improve the user experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and use lazy loading to improve page loading speed, especially for mobile users.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve SEO by optimizing meta descriptions, alt tags, and using better keyword strategies for better search engine ranking.
userExperienceTip: Enhance navigation with a more intuitive menu and clearer call-to-action buttons to streamline user interaction.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps to complete a reservation and providing clearer instructions.
